answers.author: Derek Johnson
answers.text:
Hi Robert,
Here are some example policies outlining street naming criteria that I was able to pull off the web. I hope you find them useful:
City of Austin, Texas: http://bit.ly/eLz3Ng
Larimer County, Colorado: http://bit.ly/hnjx7r
Town of Harrison, Maine: http://bit.ly/dMin6G
I hope these are helpful to you. If you need more (or different) examples, please let me know and I'll do my best to track it down. Thanks and good luck!
Derek Johnson

author: Robert Johnston
text: I am seeking information regarding criteria used in evaluating ceremonial street naming (naming which does not involve the post office, E911 addressing, etc) requests.  Thanks in advance.
title: Ceremonial Street Naming Criteria
